pageContext.claim: “If you look at McCabe and Comey, and you look at Lisa and Peter Strzok, these were bad people. And this was a -- an attempted coup. This was an attempted takedown of a President. And we beat them. We beat them. So the Mueller Report, when they talk about obstruction, we fight back. And do you know why we fight back? Because I knew how illegal this whole thing was. It was a scam.”
pageContext.analysis: James Comey, Andrew McCabe, Lisa Page and Peter Strzok were FBI officials involved in the Russia investigation. They did not orchestrate an "attempted coup" and Trump's charge that the investigation was illegal is unfounded.
